name: SYSLL
tag_list: text, messaging, iphone, ipod, touch, secure
overview:
SYSLL has one product called TigerMail Pro. TigerMail is a text messaging application developed for the iPhone/iPod touch/iPad platforms.

Main features of Tigermail Pro:

  1. It deletes any and all sent messages from both the senderâ€™s device AND the receiverâ€™s device. Nor is there a copy of the message on our server.
  2. For a one-time price of $2.99, the user can have unlimited text messaging. No monthly or yearly fees, ever.
  3. Instead of cell phone numbers, the identifiers used for TigerMail are based on email addresses. This means texting around the world with practically anyone.

Development will start soon for the Blackberry and Android platforms.
